oai_dc:dc.dc:title: North Side of Public Square Between 2nd and 3rd Avenue North, c.1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the north side of Public Square between 2nd and 3rd Avenue North, c.1950s. J.S. Reeves and Co., D.F. Siler Co., Wolff Garment Co., The Patent Button Co., and Jimmie's Town & Country Freeze are visible. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.); D.F. Siler and Company (Nashville, Tenn.); Patent Button Company;
